variants.Description in input context: This variant is predicted to be deleterious.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_012345.6:c.873A>G was found in all affected individuals.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was sequenced thrice for accuracy.

Counts.Result Description: The NM_012345.6:c.873A>G variant causes a reduction in enzymatic activity.
The NM_012345.6:c.[873-1G>A;873+1T>C] variant results in a missense mutation and is predicted to be benign.
The NM_012345.6:c.[873-1G>A;873+1T>C] variant does not impact the function of the protein.
The NM_012345.6:c.873delG variant results in a frameshift and is predicted to be deleterious.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Fisher's exact test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No mutation or benign variant in the PTPRD gene.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Presence of a deleterious or likely deleterious variant in the PTPRD gene.
